nodes.text: The letter  was the thirty-third letter of the Aurebesh alphabet. It was pronounced "Yirt," and equaled the High Galactic character Y.

In Legends continuity, the character is known as Yirt, but in Star Wars Rebels: Battle Plans from Darth Vader, the character is called "Yiry". However, Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia uses the correct name "Yirt".
